// Possible HUD - shadow behind upper left HUD

//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.30.9200.16384
    ps_3_0
    dcl_color v0
    dcl_color1 v1.w

def c221, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13

    mov r0.w, v0.w
    mul oC0.w, r0.w, v1.w
    mov oC0.xyz, v0

// approximately 3 instruction slots used


// Shader disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py --disable=0 --condition=c220.x -i -f PixelShader_68_CRC32_DBD0317C.txt
mov r31.w, c220.x
if_eq r31.w, c221.x
mov oC0.xyzw, c221.xxxx
endif
